title: üó∫Ô∏è NUTS-3 map builder
intro_html:
Upload a CSV or Excel file containing a territorial code column and a numeric column to visualize.

After setting visualization and classification parameters, a thematic map will be generated and available for download.

You may also load inset_grid.topojson to overlay the inset grid.
upload_label: Upload a CSV or Excel file
excel_empty_error: The Excel file contains no sheets with data.
sheet_select: Select the Excel sheet to use
error_min_limits: At least two values are required to define a classification.
warning_basemap: Error loading grayscale basemap. Using OSM.
